In TCM, all known medicinal plants are divided into three categories: inferior, middle, and superior. The highest forms of medicine revered in China are the superior herbs (tonic herbs), which help everything to heal and nurtures life itself. Superior herbs are thought to possess restorative properties and are used as general tonics for the treatment of disease and in convalescence.
